Runs the populate database script which will insert prepopulated data into the db. If the data already exists it will be updated to match. This will persist all other data in the database

body.raw:
library ImmunosuppressiveDrugsPriorAuthRule version '0.1.0'
using FHIR version '4.0.0'
include FHIRHelpers version '4.0.0' called FHIRHelpers

codesystem "LOINC": 'http://loinc.org'

context Patient

define PRIORAUTH_GRANTED:
  First([Claim] C
  return C.status.value = 'active')

define PRIORAUTH_PENDED:
  false
